description: This slow cooker lasagna replaces pasta with juicy eggplant slices and a quick cheesy ricotta topping.
name: Slow Cooker Beef & Eggplant Lasagna Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon a quarter of the mince mix into the slow cooker, top with a layer of grilled eggplant, then ricotta mix and repeat, finishing with a layer of ricotta mix. Sprinkle over the parmesan and cover with the lid. Cook on high for 2 hours.
